We just launched the site for one of the leading full-service event production companies in New York City, Oxygen Eventworks:

item.title: The Adolph & Esther Gottlieb Foundation
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
We spent the holiday working on the identity and page designs for the Adolph and Esther Gottlieb Foundation website.

The post The Adolph & Esther Gottlieb Foundation appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
The website re-design for the Adolph and Esther Gottlieb Foundation was the ideal project for us. Learning about a true modern artist (especially someone in the New York scene) and creating a website for his foundation really got us inspired, to the point where we even worked on the identity over the holiday break because we couldn’t wait to get a jump on it.

While researching the life and work of Adolph Gottlieb we came across many of his ‘burst’ paintings which he did later in his career and thought they’d be perfect for the foundation’s logo. They’re very iconic (he even has a painting called icon)

UPDATE: It turns out this logo isn’t going to work because it represents a very small period of the artist’s work and unfortunately people don’t know about his other periods. So on the guidance of the foundation we’ve changed the logo to be purely type based.

Website Design

Our inspiration for the layout came from modern art coffee-table books, which feature very clean and spacious layouts with modern intricate typography work placed just right. We split the page in half vertically, something that is not easy to achieve as a web layout. We were aware of the programming challenges that this would pose, but took it on anyway because we knew it’d be worth the extra work.

The post The Adolph & Esther Gottlieb Foundation appeared first on mimoYmima.

item.title: Always a Bridesmaid
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
We're re-designing the website for Always a Bridesmaid, it's the second project we're working on for this Manhattan wedding planner A-Team.

The post Always a Bridesmaid appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
We love working with this New York (and NJ!) based group of wedding planners!

We just launched Always A Bridesmaid. Xochitl and the team over at AAB have been getting a lot of compliments on the new design, here’s an excerpt from an email she sent us:

I just wanted to thank you! I am getting SOOO much amazing feedback on the new website. My friends, who are always very critical, are just raving and some of the TOP industry consultants have sent me messages on twitter about how great it looks.

The post Always a Bridesmaid appeared first on mimoYmima.

item.title: BrightRED Pixels
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
We designed the v.1 website for our friends at BrightRED Pixels, a new media company in Manhattan. We tried to keep it simple with just two points of focus: content and company identity, so of course the design was very bright and very red, check it out: brightredpixels.com

The post BrightRED Pixels appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
We designed the v.1 website for our friends at BrightRED Pixels, a new media company in Manhattan. We tried to keep it simple with just two points of focus: content and company identity, so of course the design was very bright and very red, check it out:

brightredpixels.com

The post BrightRED Pixels appeared first on mimoYmima.
